title: Putin apologizes for airline crash, does not take responsibility
description: Putin apologized for the “tragic incident” in Russian airspace, but the Kremlin did not take responsibility for downing the Azerbaijan Airlines flight.
author: Mary Ilyushina
excerpt: Putin apologized for the “tragic incident” in Russian airspace, but the Kremlin did not take responsibility for downing the Azerbaijan Airlines flight.
text: Russian President Vladimir Putin has apologized to the leader of Azerbaijan for the crash of a passenger airliner following an unspecified “tragic incident” in Russian airspace, the Kremlin said Saturday.Neither Putin nor his government has taken responsibility for downing the Azerbaijan Airlines flight that crashed in Kazakhstan on Christmas Day. The White House said Friday that evidence suggests the plane was brought down by Russia.
html:
Russian President Vladimir Putin has apologized to the leader of Azerbaijan for the crash of a passenger airliner following an unspecified “tragic incident” in Russian airspace, the Kremlin said Saturday.

Neither Putin nor his government has taken responsibility for downing the Azerbaijan Airlines flight that crashed in Kazakhstan on Christmas Day. The White House said Friday that evidence suggests the plane was brought down by Russia.
